title: Le Pactole = the Loot
brief_description:
A young couple pulls off a bank robbery only to be blackmailed by a witness, who turns out to be a corrupt police officer.

Credits: Producer, Roger Fleytoux ; director, Jean-Pierre Mocky ; writers, Patrick Granier, Jean-Pierre Mocky ; photography, Edmond Richard ; music, Roger Loubet.
Cast: Richard Bohringer, Patrick Sebastien, Pauline Lafont, Marie Laforet, Bernadette Lafont.
